paragraphs.content: To the chief Musician, A Psalm for the sons of Korah.
paragraphs.contentHtml: To the chief Musician, A Psalm for the sons of Korah.

paragraphs.content: O clap your hands, all ye people; shout unto God with the voice of triumph.
paragraphs.contentHtml: O clap your hands, all ye people; shout unto God with the voice of triumph.

paragraphs.content: For the LORD most high is terrible; he is a great King over all the earth.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For the Lord most high is terrible; he is a great King over all the earth.

paragraphs.content: He shall subdue the people under us, and the nations under our feet.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He shall subdue the people under us, and the nations under our feet.

paragraphs.content: He shall choose our inheritance for us, the excellency of Jacob whom he loved. Selah.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He shall choose our inheritance for us, the excellency of Jacob whom he loved. Selah.

paragraphs.content: God is gone up with a shout, the LORD with the sound of a trumpet.
paragraphs.contentHtml: God is gone up with a shout, the Lord with the sound of a trumpet.

paragraphs.content: Sing praises to God, sing praises: sing praises unto our King, sing praises.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Sing praises to God, sing praises: sing praises unto our King, sing praises.

paragraphs.content: For God is the King of all the earth: sing ye praises with understanding.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For God is the King of all the earth: sing ye praises with understanding.

paragraphs.content: God reigneth over the heathen: God sitteth upon the throne of his holiness.
paragraphs.contentHtml: God reigneth over the heathen: God sitteth upon the throne of his holiness.

paragraphs.content: The princes of the people are gathered together, even the people of the God of Abraham: for the shields of the earth belong unto God: he is greatly exalted.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The princes of the people are gathered together, even the people of the God of Abraham: for the shields of the earth belong unto God: he is greatly exalted.
